column4: I consistantly run into issues while using a live USB where it insists on looking for the CD in the drive instead of the USB stick ... any info on fixing this or a better work around than simply telling it that the cd is not a repository so it downloads everything
did you MD5 test the ISO you transfered?
Markc: it will use the opensource driver but should run well
can you give me a link to the md5 listing
